definition: sticky/glutinous/(Tw) to adhere/to stick on/to glue

sentences.english: There is currently no way to reclaim Thomist adhesives in China.
sentences.chinese: 目前中國沒有回收漢高黏膠劑的途徑。

sentences.english: They are the glue that binds us.
sentences.chinese: 那是使我們結合在一起的黏膠。

sentences.english: Flexible epoxy bonding or soft adhesive bonding is preferred to the packaging process.
sentences.chinese: 在包裝過程中最好使用柔性環氧黏合或軟黏膠性結合。

sentences.english: Mr. Chen suspected the fuser had melted the stickers.
sentences.chinese: 陳懷疑加熱組件融化了標籤上的黏膠。

sentences.english: Knowledge about adhesive component in telecom industry will be prior.
sentences.chinese: 有電信行業黏膠類產品知識及經驗者優先。

sentences.english: The benefits of this product are particularly evident on polyester viscose fabrics.
sentences.chinese: 這個產品的好處是特別顯然的在聚酯黏膠織品。

sentences.english: Gruesome glue traps cause animals to slowly dehydrate or suffocate to death .
sentences.chinese: 地獄黏膠陷阱會讓黏著的動物慢慢的缺水或窒息而死。
